byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and MARK LANDLER

abstract: President Obama is pressing United Nations nuclear inspectors to release evidence that he says shows Iran is designing and experimenting with nuclear weapons technology; push is part of a larger American effort to further isolate and increase pressure on Iran after accusing it of a plot to kill a Saudi envoy to the United States.
snippet: President Obama wants United Nations inspectors to release intelligence showing that Iran’s nuclear program is designing and experimenting with weapons technology.
lead_paragraph: President Obama wants United Nations inspectors to release intelligence showing that Iran’s nuclear program is designing and experimenting with weapons technology.

headline.main: To Isolate Iran, U.S. Presses Inspectors on Nuclear Data
headline.print_headline: To Isolate Iran, U.S. Presses Inspectors on Nuclear Data
headline.seo: White House Says Data Shows Iran Push on Nuclear Arms
